column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

There was another very small yarding of cattle at Powranna on Tuesday with the vast majority being cows. The few secondary yearling heifers made 282c to 300c.

The best heavy cows made 280c to 308c, leaner 234c to 260c and very lean 150c to 230c/kg live weight.

Market Reporter Richard Bailey
